languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and booking process.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: Navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your desired room, choose your dates, and fill out the booking form. You will then receive payment instructions.
faqQ2Title: How do I book a hall or section?
faqQ2Answer: Go to the 'Halls & Sections' page. You can select one or more facilities. Choose your dates, specify service needs (like catering or LED projector), and submit the booking form. Your request will be reviewed by an admin.
faqQ3Title: What payment methods are accepted for dormitory bookings?
faqQ3Answer: For dormitory bookings, after submitting your request, you will receive instructions to make a payment via bank transfer to the center's account. You'll then need to send proof of payment via Telegram for verification.
faqQ4Title: What payment methods are accepted for facility (hall/section) bookings?
faqQ4Answer: For facility bookings, once your booking request is approved by an admin, you will typically be contacted with payment details and options. This often involves direct bank transfers or other arrangements discussed with the administration.
faqQ5Title: Can I book multiple halls or sections at once?
faqQ5Answer: Yes, on the 'Halls & Sections' page, you can select multiple facilities if you are logged in as an approved company representative. After selecting your items and dates, proceed to book them together.
faqQ6Title: How do I know if my booking is confirmed?
faqQ6Answer: For dormitory bookings, confirmation usually follows after your payment proof is verified. For facility bookings, confirmation is given after administrative approval and payment. You can also check the status on relevant pages (e.g., 'My Dormitory' or company dashboard). Admins will also update the status in the system.
faqQ7Title: Who can book halls and sections?
faqQ7Answer: Halls and sections are primarily intended for booking by registered and approved companies or organizations. Individual users can book dormitories.

termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon booking confirmation or as otherwise agreed in writing. Late payments may incur penalties or lead to cancellation.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made X days prior to the event start date are eligible for a Y% refund. No refunds for cancellations within Z days.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Facility Use: Client agrees to use the facility solely for the purpose stated in the booking and in compliance with all applicable laws and center regulations. Any damage to property will be the responsibility of the client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: The Center is not responsible for loss or damage to personal property of the client or attendees. Client assumes responsibility for the conduct of their attendees.
